recipesJson.name: Rin's Unicorn Man
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Grape pixie stick base with King to add accents of a vague "red" candy flavor. Ethyl Vanillan is actually a 10% dilution at 0.50%. (purchased from Flavor Jungle, crystal form diluted in PG) Ethyl vanillan tastes like the white stick in the Fun Dip candy. Inspired by the picture posted.
